statements: UPSERT INTO Art(id, title, artist, year) VALUES (1, 'Starry Night', 'Vincent van Gogh', 1889);
UPSERT INTO Art(id, title, artist, year)  VALUES (2, 'Mona Lisa', 'Leonardo da Vinci', 1503);
UPSERT INTO Art(id, title, artist, year) VALUES (3, 'The Persistence of Memory', 'Salvador Dali', 1931);
INSERT INTO Art_Gallery (gallery_id, gallery_name, location) VALUES (1, 'Gallery A', 'New York') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE gallery_name = 'Gallery A', location = 'New York';

INSERT INTO Artwork (artwork_id, title, artist, price, gallery_id) VALUES (1, 'Artwork 1', 'Artist 1', 100.00, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = 'Artwork 1', artist = 'Artist 1', price = 100.00, gallery_id = 1;

INSERT INTO Artwork (artwork_id, title, artist, price, gallery_id) VALUES (2, 'Artwork 2', 'Artist 2', 200.00, 2) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = 'Artwork 2', artist = 'Artist 2', price = 200.00, gallery_id = 2;

UPSERT INTO artists (artist_id, artist_name, art_style) VALUES ('1', 'Vincent van Gogh', 'Post-Impressionism') ON CONFLICT (artist_id) DO UPDATE SET artist_name = excluded.artist_name, art_style = excluded.art_style;

UPSERT INTO paintings (painting_id, painting_title, artist_id) VALUES ('1', 'Starry Night', '1') ON CONFLICT (painting_id) DO UPDATE SET painting_title = excluded.painting_title, artist_id = excluded.artist_id;

UPSERT INTO galleries (gallery_id, gallery_name, location) VALUES ('1', 'National Gallery', 'London') ON CONFLICT (gallery_id) DO UPDATE SET gallery_name = excluded.gallery_name, location = excluded.location;
UPSERT INTO artists (id, name, style) VALUES (1, 'Vincent Van Gogh', 'Post-Impressionism') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Vincent Van Gogh', style = 'Post-Impressionism';
UPSERT INTO museums (id, name, location) VALUES (1, 'Louvre Museum', 'Paris, France') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Louvre Museum', location = 'Paris, France';

UPSERT INTO exhibitions (id, name, start_date, end_date, museum_id) VALUES (1, 'Impressionism Exhibition', '2022-10-01', '2022-12-31', 1) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Impressionism Exhibition', start_date = '2022-10-01', end_date = '2022-12-31', museum_id = 1;
